DOC.brief_summary: Through this study, we hope to learn more about the mechanisms, which may contribute to development and progression of head and neck cancer. The long-term goal of this study will be to develop new strategies and drugs for the diagnosis and treatment of head and neck cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Identification and Characterization of Novel Proteins and Genes in Head and Neck Cancer
DOC.criteria: All patients undergoing surgery at Stanford University for head and neck cancer. NonStanford patients.
